description: SmartFilter incorrectly rejects valid patterns or passes false positives. Affects pattern detection quality.
commonCauses: Insufficient training data for filter calibration
Context mismatch between filter and current market
Conflicting filter rules creating logic errors
Filter not updated with pattern learning feedback
solutions: Calibrate filter thresholds with production data
Implement adaptive filtering based on success rate
Add filter bypass for high-confidence patterns
Separate filter logic for different pattern types
Update filter rules from learning feedback
Provide user override for filter decisions
Log filter rejections with reasons for tuning
prevention: A/B test filter configurations before deployment
Monitor filter pass/reject rates in production
Implement filter rule validation on load
Test filters with diverse pattern scenarios
Collect user feedback on filter decisions
Document filter logic and threshold rationale
examples: if (pattern.confidence > BYPASS_THRESHOLD) { return true } // Skip filter
